notes: Amazon separates catalog data (product facts) from listing data (seller-specific: price, quantity, condition). getCatalogItem returns catalog facts; getListingsItem returns the seller's offer attributes. For creating/updating listings use putListingsItem.

fields.name: Asin
fields.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number. The primary product identifier on Amazon.

fields.name: summaries[0].itemName
fields.description: Product title. First element of summaries array.

fields.name: identifiers[0].identifiers
fields.description: Array of {identifierType, identifier} objects. Types: EAN, UPC, GTIN, ISBN.

fields.name: images[0].images
fields.description: All images: [{link, height, width, variant}]. Main image has variant=MAIN.

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: Key-value product attributes. Keys and values vary by product type.

fields.name: listingItem.summaries[0].status
fields.description: Array of status strings. 'BUYABLE' means the listing is active.
